Package controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutController
    This class displays information about the developer and license.
    AccountsTabController
    This class does all the work of adding, editing and deleting the user accounts.
    AccountTransactionsReport
    This class constructs the transactions report
    CategoriesTabController
    This class adds, deletes, and edits categories and their account assignments.
    HelpController
    This class performs all the actions associated with the help window.
    LedgerTabController
    This class adds, edits and deletes transactions in the inflow and outflow transactions tables.
    MainGUIController
    This class runs all the events needed to prepare the controls and TableViews for each tab as each tab is clicked.
    ReportsTabController
    This class renders the pie chart of bills, miscellaneous expenses and initiates the "create a report" event on button click.
    SignInController
    This class enacts all the events involved with the sign-in window.
    SignUpController
    This class enacts all the events involved with the sign-up window.
